channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 02:49 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 02:49 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region.Creck on further messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
